gobblin.runtime.scheduler

Class DefaultJobSpecSchedulerListenerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.scheduler.DefaultJobSpecSchedulerListenerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobSpecSchedulerListener

    public class DefaultJobSpecSchedulerListenerImpl
extends Object
implements JobSpecSchedulerListener
    Default no-op implementation for JobSpecSchedulerListener. It may optionally log the callbacks.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface gobblin.runtime.api.JobSpecSchedulerListener
